description: -Fixed one prechorus having the wrong placement
title: Counting On Me

description:
- Redid guitar parts
The song, like "Alone I Break" was recorded in G# Standard (C# Standard without counting the 7th string). The main riff has a harmonic that is impossible to play unless it's in G# tuning. The song can be played in Standard A tuning but the fingerings are one fret below. This tab will be in G# since it was recorded in that tuning, but here is the tab in A Standard: https://www.songsterr.com/a/wsa/korn-counting-on-me-7-string-d-standard-tab-s514333
Fieldy's bass was kept on A Standard since he plays it in that tuning live I believe from the fingerings I can see.
- Added outro cleans
- Fixed Drums in the Middle Sections

Only thing missing are vocals for now
title: Counting On Me

description:
-Re did the guitars and bass
The Middle Section A is incomplete (Missing clean part). I will put it in the next revision if I remember to update this
The main riff also am not sure if this is the exact same way to play it, but I will change the main riff if I figure out the correct fingering
Other than that, the choruses are fixed now, and there are markers throughout the song now
title: Counting On Me
